title: DDFP 609: Todd Gurley, Ryan Shazier & Marcedes Lewis!
itunes:title: DDFP 609: Todd Gurley, Ryan Shazier & Marcedes Lewis!
description:
Dave Dameshek is first joined by former NFL offensive lineman Geoff Schwartz (1:20) to discuss the best and worst o-lines in the league and the massive amount of injuries to star players this season. Also, the fellas revisit the “Food Block” discussing the best types of candy in honor of Halloween. Then, Ryan Shazier (30:52) kibitzes with Shek and Ike about the Martavis Bryant situation and Vontaze Burfict’s ongoing antics. Plus, Todd Gurley (56:25) pays Studio 66 a visit and Producer Eddie Spaghetti conducts a sideline interview with Marcedes Lewis (50:51).

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
